page.title: 11CLYRO PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: The hall provides an area for assemblies, Drama, P.E an extension to the working areas as well as providing a dinner area for lunch. School lunches are cooked in the school kitchen. The schools playing area includes a hard surface playground a sand pit and a playing field which was levelled with funds jointly provided by the L.E.A. and the{"Friends of the School {Association".} The children are divided into three classes. The teaching staff includes a {headmaster, two teachers {and a nursery assistant.}Ancillary staff include a {caretaker, a cook two {kitchen assistants }and a{mid-day {supervisor. } At eleven the pupils normally transfer to{Gwernyfed Comprehensive {School,}some six miles away.
